title: Pendant Representing the Lion-Headed Goddess
description:
Small gold lion-headed aegis made from three parts:  front, rear, and eyelet.  The front was struck from a single die and was closed off in the rear by a single sheet of metal to which was attached an eyelet.
Condition:  Eyelet missing; slight bends.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
